meanings.definition: To make three times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: She was tripling her savings by depositing extra money each month.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for tripling the amount of sugar for a sweeter taste.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved tripling the number of colorful scarves in his hand.
meanings.sent4: The company's profits were tripling, reaching new heights each quarter.
meanings.sent5: The garden was blooming, tripling the number of flowers from last year.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three similar things.
meanings.sent1: The tripling of candles on the cake symbolized the three decades of her life.
meanings.sent2: The art piece featured a beautiful tripling of vases on the table.
meanings.sent3: The tripling of kittens playing together was a delightful sight in the park.
meanings.sent4: The tripling of stars in the sky created a mesmerizing pattern above.
meanings.sent5: The tripling of colors in the painting added depth and richness to the artwork.
